data.title: CoffeeCove: Premium Coffee Buying Shop
data.content: Full Stack Coffee Shop . CoffeCove offers a curated selection of premium coffee blends and brews. Explore our diverse range of flavors, enjoy detailed product descriptions, and experience a seamless shopping journey for all your coffee needs.

data.title: UrbanValley: Modern Clothing Shop
data.content: Full Stack Clothing Shop. UrbanValley is your go-to destination for trendy and stylish clothing options. Discover our versatile collections for men, women, and kids. Enjoy easy navigation and a smooth shopping experience.

data.title: StayEase: Hotel Room Booking
data.content: Full Stack Hotel Room Booking Application. Search, Filter Features. User Can Login and Explore Diverse Hotels Using Location. Admin Panel.

data.title: BookByte: Online Book Shop
data.content: Full Stack Book Store Application With Payment Integration And Firebase Authentication, Search, Filter & Pagination Features. Admin Panel.

data.title: SnapShare: Social Media Post Sharing Platform
data.content: SnapShare is a full-stack social media platform that allows users to share, edit, and manage posts effortlessly. Built with React.js and Material-UI for a responsive frontend, the application uses Express.js for server-side processing and MongoDB for storing and managing user data, offering a smooth and scalable user experience.

data.title: Pokedex: A Digital Encyclopedia For Pokemon
data.content: Pokédex Web App repository! This web application serves as a digital encyclopedia for Pokémon enthusiasts, enabling users to learn about various Pokémon.

data.title: Crypto Creek: Real-Time Cryptocurrency Price Tracker
data.content: Crypto Creek is a responsive web application that provides real-time updates on cryptocurrency prices. Stay informed with live price tracking, explore detailed stats, and monitor market trends of your favorite cryptocurrencies all in one place.

data.title: Play Mirror: A Video Streaming Platform
data.content: Play Mirror introduces a seamless and responsive video streaming experience, allowing you to effortlessly explore and play videos across various categories.

data.title: Portfolio
data.content: Nexts was used to create the portfolio website. TailwindCSS and Framer motion were used to style the website. Sanity is utilised as a content management system.
